ingredients: 1 lb boneless, skinless chicken breast, cut into small pieces
recipe.instructions: 1. In a medium bowl, mix together the chicken, cornstarch, and soy sauce. Let marinate for at least 10 minutes. 2. In a wok or large skillet, heat the oil over high heat. Add the chicken and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes or until browned. 3. Add the peanuts, garlic, ginger, and dried chili peppers. Stir-fry for another 1-2 minutes or until fragrant. 4. Add the green onions and stir-fry for another minute. 5. Serve hot with rice or noodles.
